name: Cube Fight (JohnChambers)
description:
"Cube Fight" is a 90s' themed PvP arcade fighting game developed in 1 month by John Chambers. It features multiple characters, play styles, and a totally original NuMetal grunge sound track. Boot it up and strap in for a cuboidal rush as you and your friends pummel each other with polygons! 

Text Font made by Imagex, all other assets are 100% original and made using simple tools that are available to everyone.

This game was made as a final project for the AET Game Scripting class as the University of Texas at Austin.

Music:

https://soundcloud.com/wymsic/sets/original-song-cube-fight-sound-track-by-the-l...
